fr.cdiEnterprise.dao

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cdiEnterprise.dao.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Handle the basic SQL request for the CDI_USER table in database.
    Version:
    24-10-2016
    Author:
    Claire

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserDAO()
